translations: 女主顾；女资助人；女保护人

sentences.sentence: She was Athena, goddess of wisdom and knowledge and patroness of Athens.
sentences.translation: 她就是智慧女神雅典娜，掌管知识，是雅典的保护神。

sentences.sentence: The image of the Patroness of the Church was wrenched out of the porch centuries ago.
sentences.translation: 教堂的守护神像早在几百年前就从门廊里搬走了。

sentences.sentence: You had better neglect your relations, than run the risk of offending your patroness.
sentences.translation: 免得担那么大的风险，得罪了你的女施主。
